title: Upgrading TokenVoting
summary: Upgrading the Token Voting Plugin to 1.4
description:
# Plugin upgrade

- Supporting timestamp based IVotes tokens
- Allowing to freeze token minting
- Allowing to exclude addresses from the total token supply

# Publish New Plugin Version
- Publishes the TokenVoting Plugin Setup deployed at `___PLUGIN_SETUP___` as **v1.4** in the `token-voting.plugin.dao.eth` plugin repository at `___PLUGIN_REPO___`, with release metadata `___RELEASE_METADATA___` and build metadata `___BUILD_METADATA___`.
